name: Zombie Apocalypse
detailed_description:
Zombie Apocalypse; Zombie is a survival war against enemies. You can improve your weapons or buy new weapons. Use your special powers, weapons add-ons and equipment to survive!

  • 3 Current map
  • More than 20 weapons
  • Weapon add-ons
  • Equipment
  • Special skills
  • About 20 different enemies
about_the_game:
Zombie Apocalypse; Zombie is a survival war against enemies. You can improve your weapons or buy new weapons. Use your special powers, weapons add-ons and equipment to survive!

  • 3 Current map
  • More than 20 weapons
  • Weapon add-ons
  • Equipment
  • Special skills
  • About 20 different enemies
short_description: Improve your weapons or buy new weapons to survive in this action-packed atmosphere of zombie limbs and blood! Use equipment, special powers and weapons add-ons!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card must be 256 MB or more and should be a DirectX 9 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 190 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card must be 2048 MB or more and should be a DirectX 9 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 190 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
